posts.text:
Farmers work harder than just about anyone I know – and all they want is a fair chance.  
 
Instead, they got President Trump’s trade war, and now, too many are on the brink of collapse.
www.nytimes.com/2026/02/03/u...

replies.text: Senator, the Democrats are out of step. Too, the DNC leadership is driving the party off the cliff.
Every farmer I know voted for this.

Senator, SCHUMER MUST GO. We need someone who cares as minority leader. We need someone who will fight. We need someone who does not see Federal troops invading US cities & brutalizing everyone they can reach as normal. His tepid response is getting more people hurt and killed. Abolish ICE.
Do farmers know about leopards eating ...?

I lived on a 500 acre corn farm. The owner worked a few days in the spring on his tractor and again in the fall. Occasionally he would stop by and run his old diesel pump for irrigation. He rented the place to goose hunters in the winter. Not a tough life.

Holding grudges about past votes is not helpful. I have been urging farmers to step beyond the Wisconsin Farmers Union and organize into a collective across states,  adopting the nonviolent strategies of activists to demand change. Much better than harping on how they voted in the past.
Sadly, they did vote in their best interests nor any of our best interests. They knew what they were voting for, they just thought only other people would get hurt.
Three out of four of them voted for this to be done to them. Zero sympathy.
Sorry, I have to ask. Who did they vote for?
Almost like when you vote foolishly bad things happen.

billionaires are taking it away from them.

corporate ag is the direction this country is going in.

family farmers are becoming another Republican casualty, along with democracy and the economy.
Respectfully, Senator most farmers voted for the stupid motherfucker
Farmers need to get smart and stop voting for magats and the sex-trafficking TRAITOR perv who has destroyed farming with his STUPID tariffs.
It's almost like that's what they wanted so large corporate farms could buy up all the small farms...

Oh no!!!! Who did they vote for I wonder???? Reap/Sow.  Maybe this could be a “teaching moment” for farmers. Don’t vote for the guy who has stabbed you in the back twice now. Did they learn anything? Doubt it.
I am sorry for their plight. But when I think of all the farm fields and farmhouses displaying giant Trump signs, i have to ask, WTH?  They had to have known better.
Most farmers "got" what they voted for.
They voted for him, so they got what they voted for!!!

Yeah, yeah. Keep yapping and doing nothing Senator. They didn't want a fair chance. They wanted to punish the people they don't like because their fuhrer doesn't like them either. Most of them are caught in the net of their own making.

posts.text: Black history is American history. This month, we remember and honor the Black Americans whose struggles, triumphs, and achievements have made our state and country stronger. Let us keep lifting up Black voices and remember the trailblazers who came before us. #BlackHistoryMonth
